name: TORRE
description:
INTRO

TORRE is a tactics game with rogue-like and deck-building bits

Climb the tower by clearing chambers filled with monsters. Get rewards and new crew members and reach the top. But beware of the curses from the tower!

CONTROLS:  Left click - Select, Right click - Cancel , Z - screenshot

FIGHTING

Once per turn, any unit can:

MOVE    and  ATTACK,
HELP,
or REST .  MOVE 

TradeDODGE for more distance

 ATTACK  Units might DODGE or BLOCK .  If LIFE reaches 0 they get KO           SpendENERGY or AMMO for each attack.EXHAUSTED units can't defend!   HELP

Use HELP  to HEAL your allies

  REST  

Recover ENERGY orAMMO, 

andDODGE orBLOCK

TREASURES 

After clearing any room you get to choose between two rewards. 
Here are some examples of the upgrades you can find:

+1 MAX LIFE ATTACK hits an extra BLOCKHELP heals back an ENERGY TOWER CURSES  DOUBT DARKNESS 

Finish before the candles snuff out, or else!

SCALES REVENGE

Dead units will revive, but will make the next room  harder!
